tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_donor_type AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, ot.org_type, ot.amp_org_type_id AS org_type_id FROM amp_funding f, amp_organisation o, amp_org_group gr, amp_org_type ot WHERE (((f.amp_donor_org_id = o.amp_org_id) AND (o.org_grp_id = gr.amp_org_grp_id)) AND (ot.amp_org_type_id = gr.org_type) AND (f.source_role_id = (SELECT amp_role_id FROM amp_role WHERE role_code = 'DN' ))) ORDER BY f.amp_activity_id, ot.org_type;;;
